instructions: Open the iPhone Settings. Select Passwords & Accounts (in iOS 12 ) or Accounts & Passwords (in iOS 11). Tap Add Account . Select Yahoo from the menu that opens. Enter your Yahoo username in the field provided for it and tap Next . Enter your password on the next screen and press Sign in . Toggle the switch next to Mail to the On position. Optionally, also toggle the switches next to Contacts , Calendars , Reminder s, and Notes to the On position. Tap Save .

On the Home screen, tap the Mail icon. In the Mailboxes screen, tap Yahoo to open your Yahoo Mail Inbox. Tap any email to open and read the content. Or, swipe to the left to flag, trash, or take another action from directly in the Inbox. After you open an email, use the icons at the bottom of each open email to take action. The icons represent Flag , Move , Trash , Reply/Print/Forward , and Compose .
